StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Million Veteran Program (MVP) Summary Results from Omics Studies

Person.Organization: VA BOSTON HEALTH CARE SYSTEMBRIGHAM AND WOMEN'S HOSPITAL
STANFORD UNIVERSITYVETERANS ADMIN PALO ALTO HEALTH CARE SYSPALO ALTO VETERANS INSTIT FOR RESEARCH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The authors thank Million Veteran Program (MVP) staff, researchers, and volunteers, who have contributed to MVP, and especially participants who previously served their country in the military and now generously agreed to enroll in the study. (See https://www.research.va.gov/mvp/ for more details). The citation for MVP is Gaziano, J.M. et al. Million Veteran Program: A mega-biobank to study genetic influences on health and disease. J Clin Epidemiol 70, 214-23 (2016). This research is based on data from the Million Veteran Program, Office of Research and Development, Veterans Health Administration, and was supported by the Veterans Administration (VA) Cooperative Studies Program (CSP) award #G002.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
